name: neat-ethereum-starter
description: Template to develop fully decentralised app and games

scripts.template-test: pnpm --filter ./contracts local_node & pnpm run --filter ./contracts deploy localhost ~~ forge-deploy export localhost ../web/src/lib/contracts.ts
scripts.= sync-deps: sync dependencies to use same version across the workspace
scripts.start:contracts:deploy: pnpm --filter ./contracts watch_deploy localhost ~~ forge-deploy export localhost ../web/src/lib/contracts.ts ~~
scripts.contracts:deploy: pnpm run --filter ./contracts deploy localhost ~~ forge-deploy export localhost ../web/src/lib/contracts.ts ~~
scripts.build: ldenv -m sepolia pnpm run --filter ./contracts export @@DEPLOYMENT_CONTEXT ../web/src/lib/contracts.ts ~~ pnpm run --filter ./web build ~~ @@
scripts.dev: ldenv -m localhost pnpm --filter ./contracts forge-deploy export @@DEPLOYMENT_CONTEXT ../web/src/lib/contracts.ts ~~ pnpm run zellij-dev ~~ @@
